scripts.ios:pods:new: lsof -ti:8081 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null || true && rm -rf ~/Library/Developer/Xcode/DerivedData/sampleApp-* && cd ios && rm -rf build Pods Podfile.lock && RCT_NEW_ARCH_ENABLED=1 pod install
scripts.ios:pods:old: lsof -ti:8081 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null || true && rm -rf ~/Library/Developer/Xcode/DerivedData/sampleApp-* && cd ios && rm -rf build Pods Podfile.lock && RCT_NEW_ARCH_ENABLED=0 pod install
scripts.android:new: lsof -ti:8081 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null || true && cd android && ./gradlew clean && cd .. && npx react-native run-android --active-arch-only -- -PnewArchEnabled=true
scripts.android:old: lsof -ti:8081 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null || true && cd android && ./gradlew clean && cd .. && npx react-native run-android --active-arch-only -- -PnewArchEnabled=false
